title: Global Day of Coderetreat 2015 - Arlington, VA, USA
description:
Code retreat in Arlington, VA.  Hosted by Hobsons. 
We are metro accessible at the Clarendon metro stop, from Washington DC and Maryland. 
Please register through our Eventbrite page:  https://www.eventbrite.com/e/global-day-of-coderetreat-2015-arlington-va-usa-tickets-19102930379
